figure_1.title: Figure 1.  Differences in standing (red) between Physics and Life Science communities.
figure_1.caption: AOP stands for advance online publication.

claims.sentence:
Figure 1 illustrates how changes in the state of research objects may result in
different changes of standing between two communities: physics and life sciences.
On page 4, AOP is glossed as “advance online publication” in the caption for Figure 1, and “Advanced Online Publication” in the text.
